Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

I inform Your Excellency that Lieutenant Isaías Antônio Alz., Ensign Antônio Joaquim da Cruz, Antônio José de Carvalho, and 16 soldiers, all from the corps under my command, proceeded to Passo Fundo in order to surprise a guard of the rebels stationed there, commanded by Lieutenant Nogueira, capturing 4 prisoners and seizing 6 saddled horses, while the rest escaped through the woods.

This is what I have the honor to communicate to Your Excellency on the 17th of December, 1839.

Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Filipe Neri de Oliveira, Brigadier Commander of the 2nd Brigade. Francisco Pedro de Abreu. Lieutenant Colonel.
